p: Artemisia annua is also valued for its essential oil of which the characteristic sweet aroma has been described as grassy, fresh, and bitter with a camphoraceous nuance. The commercial significance of the essential oil is limited, but it is sometimes used in fragrances, in perfumery, and cosmetic products. The essential oil has been reported to possess antimicrobial [ 11], antioxidant [ 12, 13], leishmanicidal [ 14], and cytotoxic [ 15] activities.
